amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to implement, administer, or enforce the final rule following the Supplemental Environmental Impact Statement for the Dog Management Plan, Golden Gate National Recreation Area.

action.text: Mr. Calvert raised a point of order against the Speier amendment (A078). Mr. Calvert stated that the amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A078) offered by Ms. Speier.
